title: Carpooling
question: I will share rides or give rides to have less cars on the roads

title: Turn off Vehicle when not in use
question: I will turn off my car when I am physically not driving it

title: Riding Bikes or Walking
question: I will ride bikes or walk to go to close by stores, parks, and friendsâ€™ places than using a car

title: Public Transportation
question: I will use public transportation (buses, subway, or railway) to travel within and between cities
